scripts.build:dir: npm run clean:build && npm run build:prod && rsync -av --exclude-from=.buildignore . $npm_package_name
scripts.package: npm run clean:build && npm run build:prod && rsync -av --exclude-from=.buildignore . $npm_package_name
scripts.zip: npm run clean:build && npm run build:prod && rsync -av --exclude-from=.buildignore . $npm_package_name && zip -r $npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.zip $npm_package_name/*
